content: Morning Rohan, given your solid start on nutrition & training, I'd like to add a Continuous Glucose Monitor. It'll give us real-time insight into how your body handles different foods, and help fine-tune your ApoB strategy.
Makes sense, Warren. I like the data-driven angle. Let's do itüëç
Perfect - I'll handle the CGM order today and book a home nurse to apply it. Any preference on mornings vs afternoons?
Morning's better, before my calls start.
Got it. I'll confirm the exact slot with Sarah and the nursing service. No need for you to lift a fingerüòä
Nurse confirmed for Wed 8:30am. I'll send you a short guide on what to expect.
Thanks Ruby. Smooth as alwaysüôè
Hey Rohan - how's week 2 of the new plan? Strength work feeling solid after our in-person session?
Form feels better already. Legs a bit sore after squats, but energy's been good.
That's perfect - soreness should ease as your body adapts. Keep hitting those mobility drills; they'll help long-term.
When the CGM's on, I want you to eat normally for 3 days first. No changes - we're just observing your baseline.
Copy that
CGM sensors are on their way. They should reach you today - nurse still booked for Wed 8:30am.
Great. Looking forward to seeing the numbers.
Nurse's there now? Just checking everything's smooth.
Yep, all good. Sensor's on and app's set up. Easy process.
Perfect. Carla will be your main contact for interpreting the data. I'll handle any device issues.
Just let me know if you see any big spikes in these first 3 days. it's a good learning moment.
Morning. Noticed a spike after oatmeal today. Surprised it was that high.
That's a great catch. Let's use it for our first test: tomorrow, try scrambled eggs + avocado instead. We'll compare curves.
Sounds good. Data vs breakfast - let's see who wins üòÑ
Eggs + avocado done. Glucose was steady - no spike at all.
Exactly what we expected - protein/fat breakfasts tend to keep glucose stable. We can build from here.
Quick check-in: cardio sessions still fitting into your week okay?
Yep, 2 this week so far. Zone 2 feels easier now that I'm pacing right.
Perfect - that's exactly the adaptation we want.
Rohan. Sorry, just realised I didn't confirm the CGM delivery on Tues. Everything still arrived on time, right?
Haha yes, all good. Didn't even notice üòÑ
We've added mental focus tracking into your Q1 KPIs. This will sync with your wearable and your notes from the week.
Love it. Should give a full picture when we review next quarter.
Exactly - that's the value of this integrated approach.
Also - forgot to ask yesterday - how did you feel energy-wise after the eggs breakfast vs oatmeal?
Actually steadier through the morning. No mid-morning slump.
That's great feedback. It reinforces the glucose data. We'll keep tweaking from here.
